      • switchToActivity

        public static void switchToActivity(android.content.Context context,
                                    int DELAY,
                                    java.lang.Class activityClass)
        Helper function to switch to an activity with a delay.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context that calls this function
        DELAY - Delay until switch. Useful if some feedback or some loading is needed first.
        activityClass - The class of the activity to switch to.

                                                    Signal signal,
                                                    boolean withListener)
        Used to create a new GUI item of the signal message
        Parameters:
        inflater - the inflater to use to inflate our gui
        signal - the signal object of the signal
        withListener - whether to attach an onclick listener to this or now.
        Returns:
        the generated view
